entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 30 April 2023
